channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: The Best Kindle of 2025: Paperwhite, Scribe, or Colorsoft?
item.description: Here’s how Amazon’s ebook readers stack up—and which one might be right for you.

item.title: IKEA launches three new Qi2.0 wireless phone chargers – including one with a hidden double function
item.description: IKEA has launched three VÄSTMÄRKE chargers, and they'll work with Apple MagSafe and Google Pixelsnap.

item.title: Cette puissante enceinte Bluetooth notée 8/10 est quasi à moitié prix sur pour les fêtes de fin d’année
item.description: Robuste, étanche, endurante, l'Ultimate Ears Wonderboom 4 ne semble présenter que des qualités. Pour renforcer votre envie de l'acheter, Amazon divise son prix presque par deux puisqu'elle passe de 99,99 euros à 56,99 euros.

item.title: How Governments Turn the Internet Into a Weapon
item.description: From protests to elections, governments are increasingly pulling the internet plug on entire populations. Connectivity is slowly becoming a tool of control, not a guarantee.

item.title: Google Data Centers Are Returning Nuclear Power to Tornado Country
item.description: A destructive storm in 2020 prematurely shut down Iowa’s only nuclear plant. With Google’s plans to reopen it to power nearby data centers, will extreme weather threaten the reactor’s safety?

item.title: The 24 Best Shows on Amazon Prime, WIRED’s Picks (December 2025)
item.description: Bat-Fam, The Girlfriend, and The Mighty Nein are just a few of the shows you should be watching on Amazon Prime Video this week.

item.title: 5 essential low-impact muscle-building moves for over 50s, according to an expert Peloton trainer
item.description: I spoke to a Peloton professional trainer to get the best tips for staying fit and healthy when over 50.

item.title: I tried this Amazon best-selling soundbar from Bose, is it really worth buying?
item.description: I tested Bose’s Amazon best-selling soundbar – is it worthy of my recommendation?

item.title: Walmart's huge gaming laptop deals include up to $400 off RTX 5000 models with prices cheaper than Black Friday
item.description: Looking for a gaming laptop this Christmas? You won't beat these three gaming laptop deals in the Walmart seasonal sale.

item.title: How to watch England vs Jamaica for *FREE* — Stream Netball Horizon Series on BBC iPlayer
item.description: Here's our streaming guide on how to watch England vs Jamaica in the Netball Horizon Series from anywhere in the world.

item.title: ‘Comfort is the enemy of acting’: Is Lucas Bravo pleased to get a break from Emily in Paris season 5 in this new HBO Max show?
item.description: Before Emily in Paris season 5 even started filming, rumors were rife about Gabriel's return. With all that in mind, I'm convinced star Lucas Bravo is enjoying another role much more.

item.title: How Taylor Swift is turning the NFL’s mass-media machine into a a pipeline for new male fans
item.description: The pop star’s latest album rollout has been carefully planned to cross over into the world of football—right when sports fans have been primed to be more receptive. In the tournament of pop culture—an arena increasingly obsessed with charts, data, and stat lines—Taylor Swift has, by most measures, already emerged the victor.

item.title: Velotric Discover 2 Electric Bike Review: Versatile and Powerful
item.description: This laid-back ride comes with an almost bewildering array of power modes and riding styles. Just make sure you obey the law.

item.title: AI Toys for Kids Talk About Sex, Drugs, and Chinese Propaganda
item.description: Plus: Travelers to the US may have to hand over five years of social media history, South Korean CEOs are resigning due to cyberattacks, and more.

item.title: This is perhaps the smallest mini PC with a 5060-class GPU you can buy right now — but you will have to go all the way to China to get it
item.description: FEVM’s FAEX1 mini PC combines Ryzen AI Max+ CPU, Radeon 8060S GPU, 128 GB memory, and extensive connectivity in a compact chassis.

item.title: AI advertising slop is on the rise. The cure? The STFU brand strategy
item.description: AI snake oil is selling in the ad world, which means soon there will be only one way to stand out: Be better than the algorithm. There’s a statistic that’s been making the rounds for the better part of a decade that says the average person is exposed to about 10,000 ads every day. This has always sounded a tad suspect, as it amounts to an ad every six seconds of our waking day (it has since been debunked)....

item.title: I tested the HHKB Professional Classic Type-S — a niche option for those prepared to learn a new keyboard layout to get Topre key mechanisms
item.description: The HHKB Professional Classic Type-S is a radically deconstructed keyboard design that focuses on compact layout rather than easy adaptability.

item.title: The Worst Ways RFK Jr. Has Harmed Public Health This Year
item.description: The return of measles, weakening vaccines, and the complete destruction of the CDC are just a few of Kennedy's ignoble accomplishments in 2025.

item.title: Gear News of the Week: Android Gets Emergency Live Video, and the Pixel Watch 4 Supports Gestures
item.description: Plus: Apple Fitness+ expands to new markets, it’s even easier to add photos to Aura’s digital frames, and the new Nocs speakers go heavy metal.

item.title: The race to zero downtime is on – and AI is leading it
item.description: As digital systems grow complex, AI shifts reliability from firefighting outages to predicting and preventing failure.

item.title: New US border checks could involve scanning your last five years of social media history– here's what you need to know
item.description: The US government plans to check visitors’ social media posts and potentially bar them from entry under new proposed rules.

item.title: CNBC replaces its peacock with . . . a triangle
item.description: The logo update comes as CNBC spins off from its parent company. CNBC and its sister networks, including USA, Golf Channel, and E!, are spinning off from their former parent company Comcast NBCUniversal to form a new publicly traded company called Versant. As part of the new company, some of the brands in the portfolio have to rebrand to get rid of NBC’s iconic Peacock mark, CNBC included. ...

item.title: The 3 key financial lessons of ‘It’s a Wonderful Life’
item.description: Frank Capra’s meaningful story of community and connection, ‘It’s a Wonderful Life,’ shows us how to weather tough times together. Like many of you, I grew up watching It’s a Wonderful Life on television every holiday season. Frank Capra’s beloved film was a comforting part of our holiday tradition, often playing in the background while my family wrapped presents, cooked, or otherwise made merry....

item.title: 90 housing markets cross critical inventory threshold—tilting power toward buyers
item.description: Among the nation’s 200 largest housing markets, these 90 metro areas now have active inventory above 2019 pre-pandemic levels. Want more housing market stories from Lance Lambert’s ResiClub in your inbox? Subscribe to the ResiClub newsletter.

item.title: We tested over 30 laptops in 2025. Here are the 11 best for every budget and use case.
item.description: We tested dozens of laptops to find the best for every budget. That includes the M4 Apple MacBook Air and Microsoft Surface Laptop 7.

item.title: Voitures connectées | Les automobilistes ont-ils perdu le contrôle ?
item.description: Les voitures connectées ne nous transportent pas seulement du point A au point B. Elles nous observent et nous écoutent, constate l’Union des consommateurs, qui s’inquiète de la façon dont les consommateurs sont en train de perdre le contrôle de leurs renseignements personnels une fois qu’ils sont en voiture.

item.title: Test du CMF Headphone Pro : à 99 euros, Nothing donne une leçon d’humilité aux géants de l’audio
item.description: Difficile de croire qu’un casque vendu sous la barre symbolique des cent euros puisse réellement inquiéter les ténors du marché. C’est pourtant le pari insolent de CMF by Nothing avec son Headphone Pro. Nous avons passé ce trublion au crible pour voir s’il s’agit du meilleur rapport qualité-prix de l’année ou d’un simple coup d’esbroufe.
